description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying whether the process was interrrupted and whether the needle had been inserted in the donor's arm prior to the interruption. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DON segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0923 (Process Interruption)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: A code that indicates the status of the concept
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Walk Out: Process interrupted before the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm

definition.value: Walk Out: Process interrupted before the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm

display.value: Aborted Run: Process interrupted after the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm

definition.value: Aborted Run: Process interrupted after the Phlebotomist inserts the needle in the Donor's arm
